name: s3-rust-htslib-bam
description: CDK stack that shows bootstrapping of a Rust HTSLib app reading an S3 BAM file

scripts.build-deploy: npm run build-rust-release && npm run deploy
scripts.demo: aws lambda invoke --payload '{"bam": "'${DEMOBAM}'"}' --function-name "s3-rust-htslib-bam-lambda" response.json --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out | jq . && jq < response.json .
